<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

A graph that consists of nodes and edges.

By default, the graph is undirected.

## Components

**Required**: [`GraphNode`](../components/graph_node.md)

**Recommended**: [`GraphEdge`](../components/graph_edge.md), [`GraphType`](../components/graph_type.md)

**Optional**: [`Position2D`](../components/position2d.md)

## Shown in
* [Graph View](../views/graph_view.md)
* [DataframeView](../views/dataframe_view.md)
